replies.author: 拘束
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

[1.7.2]Treecapitator-universal-2.0.3和Plants-To-Ores V1.0

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 小猪飞
replies.txt_content: 试了，除非两个都删了。否则依旧这样

replies.txt_content: 你的MOD有问题，删掉一个一个的重装，就行，不能用的就别装
